name: wholesale-approval
content:
Hello {{first_name}} {{last_name}},
We are happy to inform you that you have been approved to be a registered Wholesale customer of Souk eCommerce.

Please Login using the credentials you used when you registered.

name: wholesale-register
content:
Thank you {{first_name}} for your interest in Souk eCommerce. We will be reviewing your application to be a Wholesaler of our products. We will contact you if there is any additional information we require to complete your application. We will also send you an email notification when your application is approved.

Thanks for your support,

Souk eCommerce Team
